get.summary: Get list of Audio files of single recitation
get.description:
Get list of #model:knzdXGgyjYnAqbhGX for a single recitaiton. See #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL endpoint to fetch available recitations.

You can also include more fields of audio files using `fields` query string.

parameters.name: chapter_number
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific surah.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: comma seperated field of audio files.

parameters.name: hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific hizb.

parameters.name: juz_number
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific juz.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a Madani Muhsaf page

parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific Rub el Hizb.

parameters.name: verse_key
parameters.description: If you want to get audio file of a specific ayah.

get.description:
Get a single #model:D7oy5DF6aGMhfLwDB of all ayah.

See #endpoint:5YnxJJGPMCLnM6PNE
endpoint to fetch available tafsirs.

You can also include more fields of tafsir using `fields` query string.

parameters.name: chapter_number
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific surah.

parameters.name: hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific hizb.

parameters.name: juz_number
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific juz.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a Madani Muhsaf page

parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific Rub el Hizb.

parameters.name: verse_key
parameters.description: If you want to get tafsir of a specific ayah.

tafsirs.text:
Which was revealed in Makkah

The Meaning of Al-Fatihah and its Various Names

This Surah is called

- Al-Fatihah, that is, the Opener of the Book, the Surah with which prayers are begun.

get.description:
Get a single #model:XCinMTfQdCrC3D3vH of all ayah.

See #endpoint:N4JAF8phDshhyrBHs endpoint to fetch available translations.

You can also include more fields of translation using `fields` query string.

parameters.name: chapter_number
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific surah.

parameters.name: hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific hizb.

parameters.name: juz_number
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific juz.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a Madani Muhsaf page

parameters.name: rub_el_hizb_number
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific Rub el Hizb.

parameters.name: verse_key
parameters.description: If you want to get translation of a specific ayah.

translations.text: In the Name of Allah—the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

meta.translation_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

parameters.description: comma separated  list of ayah fields.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to fetch word translation in specific language.

parameters.description: records per api call, you can get maximum 50 records.

parameters.description: Comma separated ids of tafisrs to load for each ayah if you want to load tafisrs.

parameters.description:
Include words of each ayah? 

0 or false will not include words.

1 or true will include the words.

text.description: Long text of chapter info, this could include html tags for formatting and styling.

source.description: Name of the source, could be a book name or site name.

example.text:
Name

This Surah is named Al-Fatihah because of its subject-matter. Fatihah is that which opens a subject or a book or any other thing. In other words, Al-Fatihah is a sort of preface.

...
example.short_text: This Surah is named Al-Fatihah because of its subject-matter. Fatihah is that which opens a subject or a book or any other thing. In other words, Al-Fatihah is a sort of preface.
example.source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran

iso_code.description: iso code of the language, you'll pass this code in api calls for fetching content in specific language.

example.text: Bismillah بِسْمِ اللَّـهِ is a verse of the Holy Qur'an

name.description: Name of the resource in specific language.

text.description: Text of the translation, text could have HTML tags for formatting and footnotes.

example.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
example.text: In the Name of Allah—the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

verse_key.description: key of the verse, key is generated using chapter number and ayah number. e.g 1:1 is first ayah of first surah.

text_uthmani.description:
Ayah text in Uthmani Script.

Uthmani script is an old-fashion script used by the third Caliph, Uthman, to produce the first standard quran manuscript.

text_imlaei.description:
Ayah text in Imla'ei script.

Imla'ei script, is the modern Arabic writing style which is currently in use.

page_number.description: page_number is deperacted, please use `v1_page` instead.

code_v1.description: Glyphs codes for QCF v1 fonts

code_v2.description: Glyphs codes for QCF v2 fonts

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v1 font. If `v1_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v1 glyph codes.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v2 font. If `v2_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v2 glyph codes.

example.text_uthmani_tajweed: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ١

page_number.description: page_number is deperacted, please use `v1_page` instead.

line_number.description: Line number in the Muhsaf for this word

code_v1.description: glyph code that you can use to render the word using QCF  v1 font.

code_v2.description: glyph code that you can use to render the word using QCF  v2 font.

v1_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v1 font. If `v1_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this word using v1 glyph codes.

v2_page.description: Madani Muhsaf Page number for v2 font. If `v2_page` value is 2, that means you'll use page 2 font file to render this ayah using v2 glyph codes.

first_verse_id.description: Id of the first ayah in this juz.

last_verse_id.description: Id of the last ayah in this juz.

files_size.description: Total size of all audio files in KBs
